• home

Get rid of unwanted hair today with Laser Hair Removal Cape Town!

You’re tired of shaving every day and having to deal with stubble. You’ve tried using hair removal creams, but they never work for you!

Imagine getting your legs silky smooth in just one week, and no longer worrying about how your legs look when you wear shorts or a swimsuit.

Laser Hair Removal is fast, easy, and affordable. It’s proven to be safe and effective on all skin types including dark skin tones. And it works great on both men and women of any age! Get rid of unwanted hair today with Laser Hair Removal!
Book Your procedure

What is diode laser hair removal and how does it work?

Laser hair removal has been around for a long time, but diode hair removal is a newer technology that offers several advantages.


First, the diode laser produces a beam of high-intensity light that is much more powerful than other lasers. This makes it more effective at destroying the cells responsible for hair regrowth.
Second, the diode laser is safer and more comfortable than other lasers because it emits less heat. This makes it ideal for use on all skin types, including dark skin tones.
Third, the diode laser is affordable and can be used on both men and women of any age. Get rid of unwanted hair today with Laser Hair Removal!


Most people experience a significant reduction in hair growth after just a few sessions. However, it’s important to note that laser hair removal is not considered a “permanent” solution because some regrowth may occur.

Book Your procedure

The benefits of Laser Hair Removal

  • It's fast - it can take as little as 15 minutes
  • It's effective - the diode laser is more powerful than other lasers
  • It's safe - the diode laser is safe for use on all skin types, including dark skin tones.
  • It's affordable - more affordable than other hair removal methods like electrolysis.
  • It works great on both men and women
Book Your procedure

How Does the Laser Hair Removal Work at Blink Beauty Salons?

Before Treatment

For the best results, it is important to avoid sun exposure for 4-6 weeks before treatment. This will help to prevent any skin irritation during the treatment process. The laser hair removal treatment is rapid and only takes a few minutes of the patient’s time. Facial and bikini treatments are typically completed in less than 10 minutes, while full-body treatments can be completed in as little as 60 minutes.

During Treatment

The laser hair removal treatment is virtually painless. There is no requirement to wax painfully beforehand, and there’s no need to go through the hair growth process. Anaesthetics are not required, and most people only feel a mild stinging sensation as the laser pulses are applied. Few body parts are more sensitive than others, and swelling or redness may occur for a few hours after the treatment.

After Treatment

Most people experience no side effects after laser hair removal treatment. However, some people may experience temporary redness or swelling in the treated area. This is normal and will typically resolve itself within a few hours. It is important to avoid sun exposure for at least 24 hours after treatment to prevent any skin irritation.

Book Your procedure

Why Choose Blink Beauty for Your Laser Hair Removal Treatment?

As with any medical treatment, choosing a reputable and experienced provider is important. Blink Beauty Salon has been providing laser hair removal treatments for over 10 years. We are one of the largest providers of laser hair removal in Cape Town, and our experienced team of medical professionals is dedicated to providing the best possible care for our patients.

In addition, we offer a variety of payment options to make laser hair removal more affordable. 

Our Diode laser hair removal machine is the latest technology available on the market for fast and effective results.  It is painfree and ensures comfort during the procedure.

Get rid of unwanted hair today with Hair Removal at Blink Beauty Salons! Call us today to schedule a free consultation.

Book Your procedure

Laser hair removal Cape Town before and after

Book Your procedure

Book Your procedure

Frequently asked questions about laser hair removal

What is laser hair removal?

Laser hair removal is a cosmetic procedure that uses a concentrated beam of light to remove unwanted hair. The light energy is absorbed by the pigment in the hair follicle, which damages the follicle and prevents it from regrowing new hair.

How diode laser hair removal really work?

Diode laser hair removal is an effective treatment that will result in long-term hair removal for many patients. It is the latests and newest technology on the market for fast and effective results.

Is it safe?

Laser hair removal is considered a safe and effective treatment when performed by a qualified practitioner. However, as with any medical procedure, there are potential risks and side effects associated with laser hair removal. Be sure to discuss these with your practitioner before starting treatment.

Does it hurt?

Most patients report that laser hair removal is a relatively painless procedure. Some may experience a slight snapping sensation as the laser pulse is delivered, but this is generally well tolerated. Topical numbing creams can be used to help reduce any discomfort.

How long does a session take?

The length of time required for a laser hair removal session will depend on the size and location of the treatment area. Smaller areas, such as the upper lip, can be treated in just a few minutes, while larger areas, like the back or legs, may take up to an hour.

How many sessions will I need?

Most patients will need 4-6 sessions spaced 4 weeks apart to achieve optimal results. However, the number of treatments required will vary from person to person depending on factors such as skin type, hair color, and coarseness.

Is there any downtime after a treatment?

There is typically no downtime after a laser hair removal treatment. Some patients may experience mild redness and swelling, but this usually subsides within a few hours. More intensive treatments may result in temporary bruising, but this is rare. You should be able to return to your normal activities immediately following treatment.

How much does it cost?

The cost of laser hair removal will vary depending on the size and location of the treatment area. Smaller areas, such as the upper lip, can be treated for as little as R500 per session, while larger areas, like the back or legs, may cost up to R2 000 per session.

Can anyone get laser hair removal?

Most people can safely undergo laser hair removal. However, the treatment may not be suitable for everyone. Be sure to discuss your medical history and any medications you are taking with your practitioner before starting treatment.

Where can I get laser hair removal?

Laser hair removal can be performed in a medical office, clinic, or spa. Be sure to choose a qualified practitioner who has experience performing the procedure. At Blink Beauty Salon we employ only well-trained and experienced personnel, skilled at administering laser hair removal.

Is permanent hair removal possible with laser?

Although laser hair removal will stunt hair growth for long periods of time, it is not a guaranteed method for permanent hair removal. Usually, multiple treatments are needed before any visible results and even then, maintenance treatments might still be necessary.

Diode laser is however the best treatment available on the market to reduce hair growth, and remove the need to shave/wax.
